content: The Grupo Supervielle, we believe has the most of this transformation program compared to -- in the financial system looking at what you see in terms of, for instance, consolidation of branches that we are pursuing since last year, and which is also in the hands of the Central Bank already, but already -- even though we are expecting the, let's say, authorization to close branches, we have already operated a drastic diminution of operating costs at all the branches that we want to close.
